Class Ghost

java.lang.Object
  GameObject
      Actor
          Ghost

public class Ghost
extends Actor

The Ghost class is the primary enemy in Pacman. Intelligent decisions of ghosts are made by the AIManager class Ghost is a subclass of Actor

Author:
Ramsey Kant

Method Detail

isInFear

public boolean isInFear()
Return the fear status of the ghost

Returns:
True if fearful

setFear

public void setFear(boolean f)
Set fear status. AIManager interperates this setting for behavior

Parameters:
f - Fear status, true if fearful

isTrapped

public boolean isTrapped()
Get the current trapped status

Returns:
True if the ghost is currently in the spawn-jail

setTrapped

public void setTrapped(boolean t)
Set the current trapped status

Parameters:
t - Trye uf the ghost is in the spawn-jail

needsNewPath

public boolean needsNewPath()
Flag that is set to true when the path reaches the last possible step

Returns:
True if the AIManager needs to assign a new path

updatePath

public void updatePath(Path p)
Update the Path object for the ghost to follow'

Parameters:
p - Path object generated in process() by the AIManager
See Also:
AIManager.process()

setDebugDrawPath

public void setDebugDrawPath(boolean d)
Direct's the paint() function to draw the current path of the ghost on the map

Parameters:
d - If true, debug is on and the path will be drawn
See Also:
AIManager.setDebugEnabled(boolean)

act

public void act()
Run a think cycle for the AI. Major decisions are made by the AIManager (pathing), this just determines movement and screen draw deltas

Overrides:
act in class Actor
See Also:
